metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5730 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The sanitize_widget_instance function inwp-includes/class-wp-customize-widgets.php in WordPress before 4.2.4 doesnot use a constant-time comparison for widgets, which allows remoteattackers to conduct a timing side-channel attack by measuring the delaybefore inequality is calculated.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
